abstract:
Hydroxychloroquine-treated patients were more severely ill at baseline than those who did not receive hydroxychlorquine ( median ratio of partial pressure of arterial oxygen to the fraction of inspired oxygen , 223 vs. 360 ) .
ONCLUSIONS : In this observational study involving patients with Covid-19 who had been admitted to the hospital , hydroxychloroquine administration was not associated with either a greatly lowered or an increased risk of the composite end point of intubation or death .

Evidence.text: Hydroxychloroquine-treated patients were more severely ill at baseline than those who did not receive hydroxychlorquine ( median ratio of partial pressure of arterial oxygen to the fraction of inspired oxygen , 223 vs. 360 ) .

s0_T5.term: median ratio of partial pressure of arterial oxygen to the fraction of inspired oxygen

Evidence.text: ONCLUSIONS : In this observational study involving patients with Covid-19 who had been admitted to the hospital , hydroxychloroquine administration was not associated with either a greatly lowered or an increased risk of the composite end point of intubation or death .

s1_T5.term: risk of the composite end point of intubation or death
